Name: The Linnean Society of New South Wales

About.Hours & facilities: Open Tues 9:30am-5pm. General reference assistance available. Copying services available for books and journals.

About.Access: Two weeks' advance notice of visit required stating purpose of research. Proof of identity required. Access to records not normally available for research can be gained by written permission from the Secretary.

About.Major holdings:
Linnean Society of NSW: Research papers in natural history.
	Early records held at the Mitchell Library, State Library of New South Wales.

Contact.Postal address:
Linnean Society of New South Wales

KINGSFORD
